p: LN and VC conceived and designed the study. LN, PS, DC and KK performed the experiments. KS performed the bioinformatics analysis and statistical analysis. CS analysed and interpreted the results, and reviewed the manuscript. PS, LN, and VC wrote and drafted the manuscript. JS, JRKC, PD, and TP reviewed and edited the manuscript and were involved in the conception of the study. All authors read and approved the final manuscript. PS, LN and VC confirmed the authenticity of all the raw data.
